name: Cheng Han 0001
content: Cheng Han Cheng Han Assistant Professor chk9k (at) umsystem.edu University of Missouri -- Kansas City, USA Biography I am a Tenure-track Assistant Professor at the School of Science and Engineering, University of Missouri -- Kansas City, USA. My research interests include adaptable and sustainable intelligence, where I design, implement, deploy, and evaluate AI systems that empower communities. I am continuously interested in recruiting Ph.D. students with a strong background in AI agents and systemic efficiency. News (09/27/2025): Website updated for new papers published in NeurIPS. Congrats to Runjia and Yiyang! News (08/21/2025): Website updated for new paper published in EMNLP. Congrats to Runjia! News (08/15/2025): Our lab website is online! While it is still under construction, please feel free to check! News (06/29/2025): Website updated for new paper published in ICCV. Congrats to Taowen! News (03/14/2025): Website updated for new papers published in EMNLP and ICLR. Congrats to Taowen and Yiyang!
